description: Explore this comprehensive guide to selling Opulus NFTs, a revolutionary platform that integrates music IPs with blockchain, allowing artists and investors to tokenize and monetize music royalties. Learn about setting up your account, creating and listing NFTs, promoting your sales, and post-sale strategies.
keywords: Opulus, NFTs, Non-Fungible Tokens, blockchain, music royalties, digital assets, DeFi, tokenize music, sell NFTs, digital wallet, Metamask, music investment
title: A Comprehensive Guide to Selling Opulus NFTs
